what do windowsformimage.cs?

i want to explain the project.

i have c++ project that have a form with a bitmapcontrol. i can createa bitmap with my c++ project . The c++ project works well.

Now i want to show a map in my bitmapcontrol.  I have create a mixedmode (c++ and c#) to use my core.dll. The mixedmode works well.

Now i want to show a bitmap on my bitmapcotrol. Dont forget i have no GMapControl.cs.

I think i have to use the function void DrawMap?
